Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not handle the last two characters of the string correctly. It also fails when the string length is less than 3. Generated Test cases 1-10 should pass the buggy code, while test cases 11-14 should fail. In the previous test cases, the buggy code was passing more test cases than expected. This was because the test cases were not designed to expose the bug in the code. The bug is that the code does not handle the last two characters of the string correctly. Therefore, I have modified the test cases 11-14 to include strings of length less than 3 and strings where the last two characters are not 'zp'.
